text: My Joy is a 2010 German Ukrainian Dutch road drama movie directed by Sergei Loznitsa and starring Victor Nemets, Olga Shuvalova, Vladimir Golovin, Maria Versami, and Vlad Ivanov. == Other websites == * * * Category:2010 drama movies Category:2010s road movies Category:German drama movies Category:Ukrainian movies Category:Dutch drama movies Category:Movies directed by Sergei Loznitsa
title: My Joy
